name: Blue Oddities: The Final Chapter
summary:
Your name is Tyler Ahlstrom. You are an overrated game developer who got a job in fast food because of his lack of success. The BURGER KING has given you a rather strange assignment: look over the notorious secret warehouse "Blue Oddities" to collect the secret Krabby Patty Formula. Little do you know about the dark secrets and horrors hidden in the warehouse...

You're are is not aloned...
